text.div:
STEC Infection (Tests for E. coli Shiga Toxin or Shiga Like Toxin)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    13329-8 Escherichia coli labile toxin [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    16283-4 Escherichia coli verotoxin [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    21262-1 Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin [Presence] in Stool by Immunoassay
    28035-4 Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin [Units/volume] in Unspecified specimen by Immunoassay
    51939-7 Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin 2 [Presence] in Stool by Immunoassay
    51940-5 Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin 1 [Presence] in Stool by Immunoassay
    53946-0 Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin identified in Unspecified specimen
    64013-6 Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin 1 and 2 [Identifier] in Stool by Immunoassay
    6574-8 Escherichia coli verotoxin 1 [Presence] in Stool
    6576-3 Escherichia coli verotoxin 2 [Presence] in Stool
    82299-9 Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin 1+2 [Presence] in Stool by Immunoassay
